PERSONA.NAME: Duke of Gloucester
PERSONA.DESCRIPTION: Uncle to the King and Protector

PERSONA.NAME: Duke of Bedford
PERSONA.DESCRIPTION: Uncle to the King and Regent of France

PERSONA.NAME: Thomas Beauford, Duke of Exeter
PERSONA.DESCRIPTION: Duke of Exeter, great uncle to the King

PERSONA.NAME: Henry Beauford, Bishop of Winchester
PERSONA.DESCRIPTION: Bishop of Winchester, afterwards Cardinal, great uncle to the King

PERSONA.NAME: John Beauford, Duke of Somerset
PERSONA.DESCRIPTION: Earl, afterwards Duke of Somerset, great uncle to the King

PERSONA.NAME: Richard Plantagenet
PERSONA.DESCRIPTION: Son of Richard, late Earl of Cambridge, afterwards Duke of York. He quietly plots to take the throne.

PERSONA.NAME: Lord Talbot
PERSONA.DESCRIPTION: Afterwards Earl of Shrewsbury. Heroic English general who dies in battle.

PERSONA.NAME: Edmund Mortimer
PERSONA.DESCRIPTION: Earl of March, Richard's imprisoned uncle who proclaims Richard as his heir.

PERSONA.NAME: Sir William Lucy
PERSONA.DESCRIPTION: He condemns the English fighting that leads to the death of John and Lord Talbot.

PERSONA.NAME: Woodvile
PERSONA.DESCRIPTION: Lieutenant of the Tower of London.

PERSONA.NAME: Vernon
PERSONA.DESCRIPTION: English knight of the White Rose or York faction

PERSONA.NAME: Basset
PERSONA.DESCRIPTION: English knight of the Red Rose or Lancaster faction

PERSONA.NAME: Charles
PERSONA.DESCRIPTION: Dauphin, afterwards King Charles VII of France

PERSONA.NAME: Reignier
PERSONA.DESCRIPTION: Duke of Anjou, titular King of Naples. His daughter marries Henry.

PERSONA.NAME: Duke of Burgundy
PERSONA.DESCRIPTION: An English ally persuaded to join the French.

PERSONA.NAME: Bastard of Orleance
PERSONA.DESCRIPTION: He presents Joan la Pucelle to Charles.

PERSONA.NAME: Son of Master Gunner of Orleance
General
PERSONA.DESCRIPTION: General of the French forces in Bordeaux

PERSONA.NAME: Margaret
PERSONA.DESCRIPTION: Daughter to Reignier, afterwards married to King Henry

PERSONA.NAME: Joan de Pucelle
PERSONA.DESCRIPTION: Also Joan of Arc. She is executed by the English.

PERSONA.NAME: Officers
PERSONA.DESCRIPTION: Officers to the Mayor of London
